label: BufNewFile
detail: starting to edit a file that doesn't exist

label: BufReadPre
detail: starting to edit a new buffer, before reading the file

label: BufRead
detail: starting to edit a new buffer, after reading the file

label: BufReadPost
detail: starting to edit a new buffer, after reading the file

label: BufReadCmd
detail: before starting to edit a new buffer `Cmd-event`

label: FileReadPre
detail: before reading a file with a ":read" command

label: FileReadPost
detail: after reading a file with a ":read" command

label: FileReadCmd
detail: before reading a file with a ":read" command `Cmd-event`

label: FilterReadPre
detail: before reading a file from a filter command

label: FilterReadPost
detail: after reading a file from a filter command

label: StdinReadPre
detail: before reading from stdin into the buffer

label: StdinReadPost
detail: After reading from the stdin into the buffer

label: BufWrite
detail: starting to write the whole buffer to a file

label: BufWritePre
detail: starting to write the whole buffer to a file

label: BufWritePost
detail: after writing the whole buffer to a file

label: BufWriteCmd
detail: before writing the whole buffer to a file `Cmd-event`

label: FileWritePre
detail: starting to write part of a buffer to a file

label: FileWritePost
detail: after writing part of a buffer to a file

label: FileWriteCmd
detail: before writing part of a buffer to a file `Cmd-event`

label: FileAppendPre
detail: starting to append to a file

label: FileAppendPost
detail: after appending to a file

label: FileAppendCmd
detail: before appending to a file `Cmd-event`

label: FilterWritePre
detail: starting to write a file for a filter command or diff

label: FilterWritePost
detail: after writing a file for a filter command or diff

label: BufAdd
detail: just after adding a buffer to the buffer list

label: BufCreate
detail: just after adding a buffer to the buffer list

label: BufDelete
detail: before deleting a buffer from the buffer list

label: BufWipeout
detail: before completely deleting a buffer

label: BufFilePre
detail: before changing the name of the current buffer

label: BufFilePost
detail: after changing the name of the current buffer

label: BufEnter
detail: after entering a buffer

label: BufLeave
detail: before leaving to another buffer

label: BufWinEnter
detail: after a buffer is displayed in a window

label: BufWinLeave
detail: before a buffer is removed from a window

label: BufUnload
detail: before unloading a buffer

label: BufHidden
detail: just after a buffer has become hidden

label: BufNew
detail: just after creating a new buffer

label: SwapExists
detail: detected an existing swap file

label: TermOpen
detail: when a terminal job starts

label: TermClose
detail: when a terminal job ends

label: FileType
detail: when the 'filetype' option has been set

label: Syntax
detail: when the 'syntax' option has been set

label: OptionSet
detail: after setting any option

label: VimEnter
detail: after doing all the startup stuff

label: GUIEnter
detail: after starting the GUI successfully

label: GUIFailed
detail: after starting the GUI failed

label: TermResponse
detail: after the terminal response to `t_RV` is received

label: QuitPre
detail: when using `:quit`, before deciding whether to quit

label: VimLeavePre
detail: before exiting Vim, before writing the shada file

label: VimLeave
detail: before exiting Vim, after writing the shada file

label: DirChanged
detail: after the `current-directory` was changed

label: FileChangedShell
detail: Vim notices that a file changed since editing started

label: FileChangedShellPost
detail: after handling a file changed since editing started

label: FileChangedRO
detail: before making the first change to a read-only file

label: ShellCmdPost
detail: after executing a shell command

label: ShellFilterPost
detail: after filtering with a shell command

label: CmdUndefined
detail: a user command is used but it isn't defined

label: FuncUndefined
detail: a user function is used but it isn't defined

label: SpellFileMissing
detail: a spell file is used but it can't be found

label: SourcePre
detail: before sourcing a Vim script

label: SourceCmd
detail: before sourcing a Vim script `Cmd-event`

label: VimResized
detail: after the Vim window size changed

label: FocusGained
detail: Vim got input focus

label: FocusLost
detail: Vim lost input focus

label: CursorHold
detail: the user doesn't press a key for a while

label: CursorHoldI
detail: the user doesn't press a key for a while in Insert mode

label: CursorMoved
detail: the cursor was moved in Normal mode

label: CursorMovedI
detail: the cursor was moved in Insert mode

label: WinNew
detail: after creating a new window

label: WinEnter
detail: after entering another window

label: WinLeave
detail: before leaving a window

label: TabEnter
detail: after entering another tab page

label: TabLeave
detail: before leaving a tab page

label: TabNew
detail: when creating a new tab page

label: TabNewEntered
detail: after entering a new tab page

label: TabClosed
detail: after closing a tab page

label: CmdlineEnter
detail: after entering cmdline mode

label: CmdlineLeave
detail: before leaving cmdline mode

label: CmdwinEnter
detail: after entering the command-line window

label: CmdwinLeave
detail: before leaving the command-line window

label: InsertEnter
detail: starting Insert mode

label: InsertChange
detail: when typing <Insert> while in Insert or Replace mode

label: InsertLeave
detail: when leaving Insert mode

label: InsertCharPre
detail: when a character was typed in Insert mode, before

label: TextYankPost
detail: when some text is yanked or deleted

label: TextChanged
detail: after a change was made to the text in Normal mode

label: TextChangedI
detail: after a change was made to the text in Insert mode

label: ColorScheme
detail: after loading a color scheme

label: RemoteReply
detail: a reply from a server Vim was received

label: QuickFixCmdPre
detail: before a quickfix command is run

label: QuickFixCmdPost
detail: after a quickfix command is run

label: SessionLoadPost
detail: after loading a session file

label: MenuPopup
detail: just before showing the popup menu

label: CompleteDone
detail: after Insert mode completion is done

label: User
detail: to be used in combination with ":doautocmd"
